title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on gauze weave
description: Fragment of silk gauze embroidered with small scale flowers and buds in blue and white on a dark blue ground that is self-patterned with a design of cherry blossoms. Probably a fragment of a summer robe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered on gauze weave. 1896-10-3.
